title: Group Synthesis Agent Output
description: Structured output from a channel-group synthesis agent. Provides intra-group mix efficiency, contradiction detection, and ICE-scored action items scoped to a single channel group.

group.description: The channel group this synthesis covers.

group_summary.description: High-level summary card for this group. Used by top-level synthesis for cross-group comparison.

total_spend.description: Sum of spend across all channels in this group. Null for groups without spend (organic).

total_revenue.description: Sum of attributed revenue across all channels in this group.

blended_roas.description: Group-level ROAS (total_revenue / total_spend). Null if total_spend is 0 or null.

channel_count.description: Number of channels analyzed in this group.

channels_analyzed.description: List of channel names that were analyzed.

top_issue.description: Most significant issue found in this group. Null if no issues.

top_opportunity.description: Biggest optimization opportunity in this group. Null if none identified.

status.description: Overall group health: GREEN = on track, YELLOW = needs attention, RED = critical.

channel_mix.description: Intra-group channel mix showing spend/revenue allocation and efficiency.

efficiency.description: Revenue Share / Spend Share. >1.0 = above weight.

contradictions.description: Intra-group contradictions or data inconsistencies. Same structure as cross-channel synthesis.

actions.description: ICE-scored actions scoped to this group. Top 3 per group.
